scripts.build-preview: npm run -s clean && tstl -p tsconfig.json & cd build && makelove --config ../makelove.toml
scripts.build-seila: npm run -s clean && tstl -p tsconfig.json && rm -rf ./build/assets && cp -r ./assets ./build/assets && cd build && ls -ls && makelove lovejs
scripts.build-release: npm run -s clean && tstl -p tsconfig.release.json & cd build && makelove --config ../makelove.toml
scripts.clean: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && ln -s ../assets assets
